context: Fully Commented C64 KERNAL ROM Disassembly with Original CBM Source Labels

splits.reason: Title, source attribution, CBM source origin notes, formatting instructions and internal comments
DISCLAIMER section - CBM copyright banner, license text, listing date

splits.name: kernal_cbm_declare_variables
splits.description: CBM KERNAL DECLARE section zero page variable declarations D6510 R6510 6510 ports PCH PCL FLGS ACC XR YR SP status registers STATUS STKEY VERCK C3P0 BSOUR LDTND DFLTN DFLTO PRTY DPSW MSGFLG PTR1 PTR2 TIME BUFPT RS-232 variables STAL LSTX NDX RVS BLNSW BLNCT PNT PNTR QTSW KEYTAB COLOR constants $0000-$E4FF

splits.name: kernal_cbm_editor1_screen_io
splits.description: CBM KERNAL EDITOR.1 screen editor part 1 SCRORG PLOT IOBASE cursor positioning CINT1 initialize I/O screen defaults LP2 keyboard buffer input LOOP5 screen input character processing PRT output to screen COLORSTOR color code table set color from PETSCII $E500-$E8D9

splits.name: kernal_cbm_editor2_3_scroll_keyboard
splits.description: CBM KERNAL EDITOR.2 EDITOR.3 screen scroll SCROL routine open space insert line move screen line synchronize color pointer clear line set start of line PRINT screen output IRQ main entry point SCNKEY keyboard scan key image processing keyboard decode tables unshifted shifted commodore control low byte screen line addresses $E8EA-$ECF8

splits.name: kernal_cbm_serial_bus_protocol
splits.description: CBM KERNAL SERIAL4.0 serial bus protocol TALK LISTN command devices talk listen SEND data SECND secondary address TKSA talk secondary CIOUT output byte UNTLK UNLSN untalk unlisten ACPTR receive byte clock handling serial data lines ATN signal IEC bus timing delay $ED09-$EEB9

splits.name: kernal_cbm_rs232_transmit_receive
splits.description: CBM KERNAL RS232TRANS RS232RCVR RS-232 transmit RSTRAB RSTBGN start transmitter NMI continue bitcount parity bit processing RS-232 receive RSINIT setup RSRBIT receive bit RSRSTP stop bit frame error break detection $EEBC-$EFDB

splits.name: kernal_cbm_rs232_io_messages
splits.description: CBM KERNAL RS232INOUT RS-232 I/O CKO232 output file BSO232 send byte CKI232 input file BSI232 receive byte RSP232 protect from NMI MESSAGES KERNAL message strings I/O ERROR SEARCHING FOR PRESS PLAY LOADING VERIFYING SAVING FOUND OK $EFE1-$F0D7

splits.name: kernal_cbm_channel_io
splits.description: CBM KERNAL CHANNELIO GETIN get character BASIN input byte from channel from keyboard screen serial RS-232 BSOUT output byte to channel OPENCHANNEL CHKIN open input channel CHKOUT open output channel device handling $F0D8-$F207

splits.name: kernal_cbm_close_clall
splits.description: CBM KERNAL CLOSE close logical file serial device CLALL close all files restore default channels CLRCHN clear channels reset DFLTN DFLTO lookup file tables LOOKUP SETLFS set file parameters $F291-$F349

splits.name: kernal_cbm_open_file
splits.description: CBM KERNAL OPEN open function serial bus device OPEN232 RS-232 open setup baud rate tables NMI vector configuration OPENI open for serial bus send filename listen secondary address $F34A-$F49D

splits.name: kernal_cbm_load_save
splits.description: CBM KERNAL LOAD load RAM function from serial bus cassette VERIFY compare memory SAVE save RAM function to serial bus cassette print SEARCHING LOADING VERIFYING SAVING messages $F49E-$F698

splits.name: kernal_cbm_time_error_handler
splits.description: CBM KERNAL TIME jiffy clock UDTIM increment RDTIM read time SETTIM set time ERRORHANDLER STOP check stop key flag error output routines error numbers I/O ERROR too many files file open not open not found device not present $F6DD-$F72B

splits.name: kernal_cbm_tape_file_control
splits.description: CBM KERNAL TAPEFILE find any header FAH write tape header get buffer address find specific file cassette header parsing TAPECONTROL tape read write block buffering motor control start stop cassette operations $F72C-$F92B

splits.name: kernal_cbm_tape_read_write
splits.description: CBM KERNAL READ cassette read routines REZ RER DIFF bit timing dipole synchronization leader byte assembly block checksum verification WRITE cassette write data serial output bit timing leader trailer end-of-data $F92C-$FCE1

splits.name: kernal_cbm_init_reset
splits.description: CBM KERNAL INIT system reset START power on entry point CBM80 autostart cartridge check RESTOR restore vectors VECTOR move vectors RAMTAS memory test initialize system constants clear zero page IOINIT CIA setup SETNAM SETLFS READST SETMSG SETTMO MEMTOP MEMBOT read set memory boundaries $FCE2-$FE42

splits.name: kernal_cbm_nmi_irq_vectors
splits.description: CBM KERNAL RS232NMI NMI handler NNMI non-maskable interrupt RS-232 NMI timing NTSC PAL IRQFILE SIMIRQ simulate IRQ for cassette read PULS IRQ BRK dispatch VECTORS KERNAL jump table $FF81-$FFF5 CINT IOINIT RAMTAS RESTOR VECTOR SETMSG SECOND TKSA MEMTOP MEMBOT SCNKEY SETTMO ACPTR CIOUT UNTLK UNLSN LISTN TALK hardware vectors $FFFA NMI START PULS $FCE2-$FFFE
